sentences.en: A nun's life runs in a groove.
a shallow groove cut into the cliff
Groove services like the hosted reflectors would have a much larger potential audience.
sentences.cn: 如hostedreflectors之类的Groove服务,应会拥有更大的潜在观众群.

sentences.en: His mind works in a narrow groove.
it might take me a couple of races to get back into the groove.
sentences.cn: 也许要经过几场比赛我才能恢复最佳状态。

sentences.en: My life seems to be in a groove. I do the same things day after day.
sentences.cn: 我的生活似乎很单调, 日复一日地干着同样的事情.

sentences.en: Sliding doors and windows move in groove.
sentences.cn: 滑动门和滑动窗都在凹槽中移动.

sentences.en: Something exactly like what Groove provides.
sentences.cn: 而这正好就是Groove所提供的.

sentences.en: The band is really in the groove tonight.
sentences.cn: 乐队今晚演奏得精彩极了.

sentences.en: The bolt slid easily into the groove.
The cupboard door slides open along the groove.
The flower show was a groove.
The lug produces a " pinched " effect contact with the groove side.
sentences.cn: 极耳产生一种 “ 压力 ” 作用与沟槽侧边相接触.

sentences.en: These young girls really groove on his music.
sentences.cn: 这些小姑娘迷上了他的音乐.

sentences.en: They're happy to stay in the same old groove.
What would happen if the Groove runtime were free?
sentences.cn: 如果Groove执行环境是免费的又将 如何 ?

sentences.en: Why do you keep picking on Groove, Joel?
sentences.cn: 为什么你不断地提到Groove, 思博兄?

sentences.en: You all need to step back, because Fredster's got his groove on.
sentences.cn: 你们最好都退后, 因为我现在状态极佳.

words.tran_cn: 带纹道的；表面有沟槽的

phrases.tran_cn: 坡口焊，凹槽焊；开槽焊接
(非正式)表现出色的；自信心足的

trans.tran_cn: 沟，槽，[俚语]常规，老套：确定的规范，[俚语]理想状况，[俚语]非常愉快的经历
trans.tran_en: a thin line cut into a hard surface
